lyrics: I'm dreaming of a White ChristmasJust like the ones I used to knowWhere the treetops glistenAnd children listenTo hear sleigh bells in the snowI'm dreaming of a white ChristmasWith every Christmas card I writeMay your days be merry and brightAnd may all your Christmases be white
translated_lyrics: I'm dreaming of a white Christmasmas-- Just like the ones, I used to know...where ops, children, children, children, bells in the, sleigh bells in the. I'm dreaming. dreaming of a white Christmas. Card I writeMay your days be merry and brightAnd may all your Christmases be white
